parameters.name: description
parameters.value: User cannot login with correct credentials

values.content:
=You are a JSON parser. Extract action items from meeting notes.

Input format:
- Action description
- URL (optional)
- ">" separator
- Assignee name

Output format (JSON array only):
[
  {
    "assignes": "Assignee Name or empty string if none",
    "content": "Action description\nURL if present"
  }
]

Rules:
- Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown or explanation
- Keep URLs on separate line with \n
- Use empty string "" if no assignee
- Skip empty content entries

Parse this text:
{{ $json.actionList }}

=Clean this task data and create a professional task title.

Task: {{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

Create:

1. Professional title (max 50 chars) - read from description field, save as "task_name"

2. Clean description - keep URL on new line

3. Keep assignee as-is

4. Keep user_id as-is

5. Keep employee_present_in_employees_list as-is

6. If employee_present_in_employees_list is "No", add note field explaining the assignee was not found

Return ONLY this JSON:

{"task_name":"title here","description":"text\nurl","assignee":"name","employee_present_in_employees_list":"Yes/No","user_id":number,"note":"if needed"}

No markdown, no explanation, just the JSON object.
